medium:
Yueh ware
Porcelaneous stoneware with modeled and carved lotus motif under green glaze
title: Tripartite Cosmetic Box
text: This high-fired stoneware covered with a celadon glaze is typical of the southern family of green ware termed Yueh ware. This small, domestic work dates from the last century of the Yueh ware tradition.
creditline: Gift of funds from the Asian Art Council, by exchange
